definition: (computer science) the assignment of particular areas of a magnetic disk to particular data or instructions
details:
noun
- (computer science) the assignment of particular areas of a magnetic disk to particular data or instructions
= synonyms: storage allocation
- the act of distributing by allotting or apportioning
= synonyms: allotment, apportionment, apportioning, parceling, parcelling, assignation
- a share set aside for a specific purpose
= synonyms: allotment
